医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
统计模型分析索马鲁肽对非糖尿病肥胖个体的成本效益新的研究显示，对于没有糖尿病但患有心血管疾病的超重或肥胖个体来说，索马鲁肽（Ozempic，Wegovy）按目前的定价并不划算。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Statistical-model-analyzes-the-cost-efficiency-of-semaglutide-for-non-diabetic-obese-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Statistical-model-analyzes-the-cost-efficiency-of-semaglutide-for-non-diabetic-obese-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bec1668f-d789-4d84-811a-0e91dfb99327 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 13:19:00 -0500 Statistical model analyzes the cost-effectiveness of semaglutide for non-diabetic obese individuals
突破性的 G6PD 诊断测试已通过 WHO 资格预审，以确保安全的疟疾治疗2024 年 12 月 18 日，世界卫生组织 (WHO) 通过了首个葡萄糖-6-磷酸脱氢酶 (G6PD) 缺乏症诊断测试的资格预审，该测试有助于安全地提供世界卫生组织推荐的治疗方法，以预防间日疟原虫 (P. vivax) 感染复发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Groundwriting-G6PD-diagnostic-test-prequalified-by-WHO-to-ensure-safe-malaria-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Groundwriting-G6PD-diagnostic-test-prequalified-by-WHO-to-ensure-safe-malaria-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47742795-e0ea-4140-aba5-a1ec48dcf877 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 13:05:52 -0500 Groundbreaking G6PD diagnostic test prequalified by WHO to ensure safe malaria treatment
第二次猪心脏移植研究为异种移植提供新方向马里兰大学医学院的外科医生科学家继续在异种移植领域取得重大进展，对世界上第二名接受转基因猪器官的患者进行了广泛的分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Research-from-second-pig-heart-transplant-provides-new-directions-for-xenotransplantation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Research-from-second-pig-heart-transplant-provides-new-directions-for-xenotransplantation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5bcc95ce-a198-4e4d-aa64-2c05c94bf0e4 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 12:55:36 -0500 Research from second pig heart transplant provides new directions for xenotransplantation
从枸杞中简单绿色合成银纳米颗粒随着对可持续性的追求渗透到各个领域，研究人员开始转向一种独特的有机来源来制造抗菌银纳米粒子（Ag-NP）——不起眼的枸杞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Simple-green-synthesis-of-silver-nanoarticles-from-goji-berry.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Simple-green-synthesis-of-silver-nanoarticles-from-goji-berry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d81a499-03bc-4258-93fa-ed34be1f1726 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 12:36:08 -0500 Simple green synthesis of silver nanoparticles from goji berries
压力如何加剧过敏性皮肤炎症研究人员调查了压力加剧免疫球蛋白 E 皮肤过敏性炎症的细胞和分子机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/How-stress-fuels-allergic-skin-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/How-stress-fuels-allergic-skin-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61ffdc00-9f9f-425f-bf17-a463c966cb62 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 12:28:00 -0500 How stress fuels allergic skin inflammation
靶向 miR-4274 和 PEX5 有助于克服结直肠癌的放射抗性结直肠癌 (CRC) 是一个全球性的健康问题，尽管放射治疗取得了进展，但 CRC 患者的内源性放射抗性仍然是一个挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Targeting-miR-4274-and-PEX5-can-help-overcome-radioresistance-in-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Targeting-miR-4274-and-PEX5-can-help-overcome-radioresistance-in-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=244b46d2-1b4f-48e2-b316-ddfb6de41d07 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 12:25:00 -0500 Targeting miR-4274 and PEX5 can help overcome radioresistance in colorectal cancer
研究表明美国西海岸鱼类和贝类中普遍存在微塑料污染研究人员测量了美国西海岸捕获的各种海鲜中存在的人为颗粒水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Study-reveals-widespread-micro Plastic-contamination-in-US-West-Coast-fish-and-shellfish.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Study-reveals-widespread-micro Plastic-contamination-in-US-West-Coast-fish-and-shellfish.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29fd3ca6-8f0e-4aac-acb1-42c95daeeaea Thu, 09 Jan 2025 12:11:00 -0500 Study reveals widespread microplastic contamination in U.S. West Coast fish and shellfish
Ingenza 与 HydRegen 合作推进可持续生物制造Ingenza 与 HydRegen 的合作重点是优化酶表达，为更环保、更具成本效益的胺化学品生产铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Ingenza-partners-with-HydRegen-to-advance-sustainable-biomanufacturing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Ingenza-partners-with-HydRegen-to-advance-sustainable-biomanufacturing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0668c7d7-9e74-4f19-9fdb-b4e23e6a2a05 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 11:21:00 -0500 Ingenza partners with HydRegen to advance sustainable biomanufacturing
英国的药品支付披露系统未能保护患者和公众信任英国巴斯大学和瑞典隆德大学的研究人员在《BMJ Evidence》上发表的一项新分析显示，英国披露制药公司向医疗保健专业人员和组织付款的自我监管系统未能保护患者和公众信任。 -基础医学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/UKs-drug- payment-disclosure-system-fails-to-protect-病人-and-public-trust.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/UKs-drug- payment-disclosure-system-fails-to-protect-病人-and-public-trust.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e23fbd4-09d6-4231-9742-d26b23654f56 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 09:15:16 -0500 UK's drug payment disclosure system fails to protect patients and public trust
新测试预测肺癌生存率优于现行标准弗朗西斯·克里克研究所、伦敦大学学院癌症研究所和伦敦大学学院医院的研究人员表明，一种名为 ORACLE 的测试可以比目前使用的临床风险因素更好地预测诊断时肺癌的生存情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/New-test-predicts-lung-cancer-survival-better-than-current-standards.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/New-test-predicts-lung-cancer-survival-better-than-current-standards.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b1e8da1-9a8e-4d60-b2f9-68861d74a4a0 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 08:53:55 -0500 New test predicts lung cancer survival better than current standards
